name: Trick or Traitor (Jackson-Willis)
description:
The guests at this Halloween party are not what they seem. Interrogate your fellow partygoers, and find the real monsters! This game was made in a 48-hour span during GDK Spooky Jam '21 with the theme "Unnatural."

Credits:

Tempe - Programmer/Designer

Jessica Blask - 2D Artist

Rachel Fuller - 2D Artist

Kyle Remy - 2D Artist

Rayyan Haque - 2D Artist

Jackson Willis - Lead Writer

Stephanie Smith - Writer

Davon Hazell - Writer

Jamie LaRose - Sound Designer
